mapper.select: SELECT u.id, u.username, u.password, u.salt, u.phone, o.NAME AS organame, r.NAME AS rolename, r.ext, p.NAME AS permname FROM t_user u LEFT JOIN organize o ON o.id = u.orga_id LEFT JOIN t_user_role ur ON ur.userid = u.id LEFT JOIN t_role r ON r.id = ur.roleid LEFT JOIN t_role_perms rp ON rp.role_id = r.id LEFT JOIN t_perms p ON p.id = rp.perm_id where u.username = #{username} and u.password= #{password}

SELECT o1.id, o1.name, o2.name as parentorganame, ot.name as orgatypename, o1.location, o1.orga_number as organum, o1.ext FROM organize o1 JOIN orga_type ot ON ot.id = o1.id left join organize o2 on o2.id = o1.parent_id where o1.name like concat('%',#{orgName},'%')
mapper.insert: insert into organize (name , parent_id, type_id, location, orga_number, ext) values (#{name},#{parentId},#{typeId},#{location},#{orgaNumber},#{ext})
mapper.select: select id,name,ext from t_role where name like concat('%',#{roleName},'%')
mapper.delete: DELETE t_role, t_role_perms, t_user_role FROM t_role INNER JOIN t_role_perms ON t_role_perms.role_id = t_role.id INNER JOIN t_user_role ON t_user_role.roleid = t_role.id WHERE t_role.id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT u.id, u.username, u.password, u.salt, u.phone, o.NAME AS organame, r.NAME AS rolename, r.ext, p.NAME AS permname FROM t_user u LEFT JOIN organize o ON o.id = u.orga_id LEFT JOIN t_user_role ur ON ur.userid = u.id LEFT JOIN t_role r ON r.id = ur.roleid LEFT JOIN t_role_perms rp ON rp.role_id = r.id LEFT JOIN t_perms p ON p.id = rp.perm_id where u.username like concat('%',#{key},'%') or u.phone like concat('%',#{key},'%')

SELECT u.id, u.username, u.password, u.salt, u.phone, o.NAME AS organame, r.NAME AS rolename, r.ext, p.NAME AS permname FROM t_user u LEFT JOIN organize o ON o.id = u.orga_id LEFT JOIN t_user_role ur ON ur.userid = u.id LEFT JOIN t_role r ON r.id = ur.roleid LEFT JOIN t_role_perms rp ON rp.role_id = r.id LEFT JOIN t_perms p ON p.id = rp.perm_id where u.id = #{id}
